===Etymology===
Probably from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=とうちょう}} compound {{m|ltc|盜聽|tr=dawH theng|lit=steal a listen}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} traditional {{m|cmn|盜聽}} and simplified {{m|cmn|盗听|tr=dàotīng}}.
